name: Brella
description: Brella | Smarter networking  Brella is the simplest networking application for business events and conferences. Discover valuable contacts at any event and book 1-to-1 meetings with the best connections. Plan your event agenda and networking meetings before the event begins and save valuable time.  Brella helps you achieve your event goals, no matter if youre looking for new business partners or you want to grow your business network. Instead of stressing about networking, let Brella do the networking for you. Youll leave the event with more leads, more contacts, more clients - more whatever youre looking for.  When you use the Brella app at an event, youll:   Discover valuable contacts  Book 1-to-1 meetings with them  Create meaningful business relationships  Check out more great event experiences from our YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3_uyruZwm4jDvAJfh57cZg  Get in touch at hello@brella.io or on Instagram and Twitter @Brellanetwork   We ask permission for:  Notifications to give real-time information about meetings and other event-related info Camera and pictures to set up a profile picture
